sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da je neko dejstvo ali položaj
an indictment of something
, hočemo povedati, da kaže, kako slaba je tista stvar.

seg.quote: It is a striking indictment of our educational system that so many children cannot read or write.

sense.def:
An indictment
je obtožba proti neki osebi, ki naj bi storila zločin;

seg.quote: The indictment was read to the jury.
Robbins is under indictment for fraud.
